name: TOLTEC AND THE MYSTERIES OF THE SECRET ISLAND
name_original: TOLTEC AND THE MYSTERIES OF THE SECRET ISLAND
description:
The planet of the Durrallians is dying . After the attack of General Roboto, the Kinematic engine of the planet stopped working. The remaining Testrasterakt orbs was stolen by K-Kryous the young apprentice of General Roboto. You Tarran of Durrall, you must return to earth and to the secret island of the Toltecs to collect the last Testrasterakt orbs which was hidden by Rhess the oldest of the Elders. The island is full of traps ,enemies and mysterious enigmas.The future of Durrall is on you now.

KEY FEATURES:

-Stunning 2D hand-painted graphics.

-Challenging and unique gameplay based on the “hard to beat” 90s arcade games.

-Atmospheric sounds and visuals that will make you “feel” the game enviroment.

-Unique and simple mouse-only controlled gameplay suitable for gamers with disabilities.

-Secret treasures and passages that make the game even more challenging.

-A gallery of concept art.
